Module contents¶

Neuroimaging data classes and utilities

cortex.datasets.neuroimaging.medfilt(x, k)¶

Apply a length-k median filter to a 1D array x. Boundaries are extended by repeating endpoints.

cortex.datasets.neuroimaging.resolve(dataset)¶
